description:
THE FOAM WHERE TO BUY RESOURCE PAGE: 
https://blackmagiccraft.wordpress.com/foam-buying-guide/

http://www.blackmagiccraft.ca

Tools & Supplies I use most: https://blackmagiccraft.wordpress.com/shop/

Support Black Magic Craft on Patreon: http://patreon.com/blackmagiccraft

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Black-Magic-Craft-677344725740094/?ref=bookmarks

This episode I cover the Extruded Polystyrene/XPS/Insulation foam that I use in most of my projects and tutorials. What is it and where can you buy it?

title: Basics: What is that foam you use and where do I get it? (Black Magic Craft Episode 028)
